creator: Creator
how_to_play_1: 1. Select a wordset by topic and language to start playing.
how_to_play_2: 2. The letters in the wordset will be randomly scrambled (e.g. apple -> plpae).
how_to_play_3: 3. Arrange and answer the complete word to move to the next word.
how_to_play_4: 4. Each word you have 1 chance to use hint if available.
how_to_play_5: 5. Complete all the words in the wordset to finish.
scoring_1: 1. Ranking will be calculated based on total score and total time.
scoring_2: 2. Each wordset will have its own ranking.
scoring_3: 3. You can replay unlimited times to improve your ranking.
scoring_4: 4. You will earn experience points after each play.
